My daughter recently wore this on a cruise for formal night and she got compliments nonstop everywhere we went.  It fit true to size, she is normally a 10/12 and this fit great. I love the Grace Karin brand, I order a lot of things and all of them are extremely high quality and for the most part true to size.  The sequins on this dress look great and are well attached (haven't lost a single one yet).  The design of this dress is gorgeous with the litttle mini dress in front and the chiffon train and side pieces.  You won't be disappointed!!

I purchased this dress for my 7 year old daughters someone special dance. She loved it but we purchased another one that she liked better. She did say it was itchy from the sparkles. The outer layer was a little long on her too. But it was really pretty and perfect dress for a school dance.

I got this dress for my daughter, who wears a 5T or x-small in kids. I got the 5-6 and it fits her well with a little room to grow. The dress itself seems very well made, and the sequins catch the light beautifully. The back of the dress doesn't reach her feet, which is good because that prevents tripping on it or it running along the ground and catching dirt. Once the weather warms up, I'm sure my daughter will be wanting to wear it everywhere, as it makes her feel like a princess. Overall, this is a great dress for kids. It's shiny, flowy, and is made well.
My daughter picked this out for her father/daughter dance. She normally wears a size 6 and it fit perfectly! It was so beautiful. She said it didn’t itch and felt comfy all night long at the dance
My granddaughter looks absolutely stunning in this dress! Fits her so well. She’s a 5t and I got a 5-6. She loves the sparkles and the flowing back. I’m happy with this purchase

I bought this for my daughter. She loves the long sheer part. She is 10 and it fits her perfectly.

评论概述: Grace Karin for the win again - beautiful dress and excellent quality
评论详情: My 8yo daughter has a father/daughter dance coming up next month so I ordered this dress for the special occasion.  I have ordered GRACE KARIN brand clothing (mostly dresses!) for both my daughters and myself quite a few times and I have never once been disappointed in the fit or the quality.This dress is downright gorgeous.  My daughter is 8yo, 65lbs and the size 10 fits her nicely.  She is very sensitive to how her clothing "feels" and this dress has a soft liner that prevents the sequins from being an irritant.  The style is very elegant and unique with the shimmering bodice and flowing outer skirt. I don't think my daughter could have been any happier with any other dress as this one is simply stunning.If you're looking for a special occasion dress, I can't recommend this one highly enough.  It's incredibly beautiful, well-made, and so unique that your daughter will likely feel like a princess when she wears it!
The photos in the listing do not do this dress justice! It is so pretty in person. Great quality for the price! My 11 year old LOVED it and felt confident wearing it. The 14 was a perfect fit.

I got this dress for my niece and it looks beautiful on her! This dress is perfect for events, party’s, or gatherings as it is fancy and elegant! The style is very unique and the material is very good quality! Overall, this dress is very beautiful and makes a perfect gift!
Very cute. Nice quality dress with the size. Great for kids love that Shaw be so pretty with silver heels

This is such a cute, fashionable, girls halter neck sequin dress. The fitting is true to size. No weird itchy areas, and no off-putting chemical smell.  Grace Karin makes some beautiful dresses, and this is another one. The sequins are very sparkly and compliment the chiffon flowing skirt. You truly feel like a princess with power in this dress with the sparkles and chiffon train.  This halter dress is also very flattering and true-to-color. The only downside is the underarms - if you don't have breasts to fill the gap, you will need to wear some sort of undershirt or training bra to make sure you are modest. That is seriously the only complaint though. This is a great dress!

This dress is gorgeous. I told my daughter she looked like a movie star when she put it on. She looked so beautiful that I almost cried.  I believe this dress fits slightly smaller than other dresses across this brand.

评论概述: Daughter loves her twirly sparkle dress
评论详情: Got for my daughter for a father daughter dance and she loves the sparkles and the dress frills to be able to spin and feel like a princess.  Overall size fits as expected, and she had no complaints with comfort.

Got this for my daughter for the dad/daughter dance. My daughter is 4, though, so this fits a bit to big. The quality, though, is great! It's got a nice shine with the sequins and the fabric is thick enough for it not to be uncomfortable, but thin enough for it to not be too hot. The tule train is super cute and she loves to twirl with it. Will definitely wear it to the next d/d dance when it fits. Until then, will keep it safe. Not sure about washing it. Since we don't have any event to wear it to, we haven't laundered it yet. If it doesn't survive, though, I'll update...and be sad. Until then, 5*.

评论概述: Prettier in person than in the picture!
评论详情: Super cute and shinny, light lining keeps the sequins from being scratchy, train is the perfect length.
